CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting on 28 February. A 17 January statement by Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer emphasised Dynamics CRM's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data .
